title: Here's a reading list of 20 influential articles on multimodal machine learning (ML) up to 2022. These articles cover a range of topics including theory, applications, and advancements in the field
**"Multimodal Machine Learning: A Survey and Taxonomy"** - Tadas Baltru≈°aitis, Chaitanya Ahuja, and Louis-Philippe Morency
A comprehensive survey that categorizes and reviews the state of multimodal machine learning
**"Deep Multimodal Representation Learning: A Survey"**
A survey focusing on deep learning approaches for multimodal representation learning
**"Multimodal Sentiment Analysis: Addressing Key Issues and Setting Up the Baselines"** - Soujanya Poria
Discusses the challenges and baseline methods for multimodal sentiment analysis
**"Multimodal Learning with Deep Boltzmann Machines"** - Nitish Srivastava, Ruslan Salakhutdinov
Introduces a deep learning model for learning multimodal representations
**"Multimodal Neural Language Models"** - Desmond Elliott
Explores neural language models that incorporate multiple modalities
**"Multimodal Machine Translation with Embedding Prediction"**
Investigates the use of multimodal data for improving machine translation
**"Multimodal Generative Models for Scalable Weakly-Supervised Learning"**
publisher: Elad Hoffer, Itay Hubara, Daniel Soudry

title: Proposes generative models for learning from multimodal data with limited supervision
**"Multimodal Deep Learning for Robust RGB-D Object Recognition"** - Lior Bo, Xiaofeng Ren
Discusses the use of multimodal deep learning for object recognition using RGB-D data
**"Multimodal Emotion Recognition from Speech and Text"**
note: Amir Zadeh, Minghai Chen, Soujanya Poria, Erik Cambria, Louis-Philippe Morency (2017

title: Presents a method for recognizing emotions using both speech and text data
**"Multimodal Learning for Video Classification"** - Andrej Karpathy, George Toderici, Sanketh Shetty, Thomas Leung, Rahul Sukthankar, Li Fei-Fei
Explores multimodal learning techniques for classifying video content
**"Multimodal Learning with Low-Rank Modality Fusion"** - Paul Pu Liang, Louis-Philippe Morency, Ruslan Salakhutdinov
Introduces a low-rank fusion method for combining multiple modalities
**"Multimodal Transformer for Unaligned Multimodal Language Sequences"**
publisher: Paul Pu Liang, Amir Zadeh, Louis-Philippe Morency

title: Proposes a transformer-based model for handling unaligned multimodal sequences
**"Multimodal Speech Emotion Recognition Using Audio and Text"**
Combines audio and text data for improved emotion recognition
**"Multimodal Machine Learning for Automated ICD Coding"** - Yifan Peng, Shankai Yan, Zhiyong Lu
Applies multimodal learning to automate the coding of medical records
**"Multimodal Learning for Image and Video Captioning"** - Oriol Vinyals
publisher: Alexander Toshev, Samy Bengio, Dumitru Erhan

title: Discusses methods for generating captions for images and videos using multimodal data
**"Multimodal Learning for Visual Question Answering"**
Explores techniques for answering questions about images using multimodal data
**"Multimodal Learning for Human Activity Recognition"** - Zhiwu Huang, Ruiping Wang, Shiguang Shan, Xilin Chen
Investigates the use of multimodal data for recognizing human activities
**"Multimodal Learning for Medical Image Analysis"**
Reviews multimodal learning techniques for analyzing medical images
**"Multimodal Learning for Autonomous Driving"**
note: Chenyi Chen, Ari Seff, Alain Kornhauser, Jianxiong Xiao (2015

title: Discusses the application of multimodal learning in the context of autonomous driving
**"Multimodal Learning for Healthcare Applications"**
Explores the use of multimodal learning in various healthcare applications
These articles provide a solid foundation for understanding the principles, challenges, and advancements in multimodal machine learning
